âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Reconstructs 3D scenes from single-view images. â€¢ Uses Flux-based diffusion models for image outpainting and inpainting. â€¢ Employs 3D Gaussian Splatting for efficient 3D scene representation. â€¢ Integrates Rerun for real-time 3D visualization and debugging.
ðŸ“– Summary: VistaDream is a framework for reconstructing 3D scenes from single images. It leverages Flux diffusion models for image outpainting and inpainting, 3D Gaussian Splatting for efficient scene representation, and Rerun for real-time visualization. The framework uses a two-stage pipeline involving coarse 3D scaffold construction and multi-view consistency sampling to generate high-quality novel views.
